#PyBot An easily extensible IRC bot written in python 3. --- ###Configuration The configuration file uses JSON. You can create a default configuration file by running the program with the -c parameter. The following is an example of a configuration file. The config file should be placed in the root directory of the bot (i.e. the same directory as the src folder is placed in). 
{
    "nickname": "PyBot", 
    "realname": "PyBot",  
    "servers": {
        "freenode": {
            "address": "irc.freenode.org",
            "port": 6697,
            "ssl": true, 
            "identify": false,
            "channels": ["#python"]
        }
    },
    "commands": {
        "cf": {
            "tkn": "cloudflare token", 
            "z": "site", 
            "email": "email"
        }
    }
}
